Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the eighth inning
The Dodgers scored two unearned runs in the second inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets barely posed a threat
The manager Carlos Mendoza plans to stick with slumping Francisco Alvarez
Post-Match Reflections: Francisco Lindor said, 'We didn’t do anything to give them moments. They didn’t get what they came here to see'
Manager Carlos Mendoza said, 'I’m pretty confident they will come through'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Citi Field
Walker Buehler and the Dodgers bullpen held the Mets to four hits
Others: The Mets managed only four hits (all were singles)
The Mets loaded the bases in the bottom of the inning before Alvarez and Lindor struck out against Buehler to end the threat
